participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and reflective, enjoys sharing experiences and values family time.
participant_1.background: I want to spend more time with my grandchildren. I wear a dress that makes me feel beautiful and go for a walk in the park. I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things. I have two nephews. Our class is planning a trip to Japan.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and resourceful, enjoys finding new ways to repurpose items and values family connections.
participant_2.background: I'm proud of the time I traveled the country in my car. I like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items. I run my own cleaning company and love spending time with my family. My friends don’t call me by my real name. I own my own music store.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Doing great! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
I'm glad to hear that! What are you up to today?
I'm just relaxing at home today. What about you?
I'm actually running my own cleaning company today.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of work!
It can be, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. What's your favorite part of the job?
I like being able to help people and make their homes clean and beautiful.
That's a great answer. What's your least favorite part of the job?
My least favorite part is dealing with difficult clients.
I can imagine that can be tough.
It can be, but it's all part of the job.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm actually planning a trip to Japan with my class.
Oh, that sounds exciting! I've never been to Japan.
I've been there once before and it was amazing. I'm really excited to go back.
I bet it will be a great trip!
I'm sure it will be
